title: Cultural scenes - Studio visit with Seiji Kimoto
intro_text: For TV series "Cultural scenes", famous writer Wladimir Kaminer from Berlin embarked on a journey into the cultural diversity of the Federal Republic, and in the Saarland, he stopped off at Seiji Kimoto. The piece gives an insight into the life and work of the artist in his studio in Neunkirchen.
lnkText: Source: 3Sat Mediathek (In German, via YouTube channel "Seiji Kimoto")
